items.title: Asean Summit: Full rehearsal of phased traffic diversions starts 8am tomorrow (Oct 23)

items.title: Get up to 615 CFM of clearing power with this EGO 56V cordless electric leaf blower at $150 (Reg. up to $220)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the EGO Power+ 56V 615 CFM Cordless Leaf Blower with 2.5Ah battery at $149.91 shipped. While you can find it listed at various retailers as high as $220, we’ve seen it keeping down at $199 since the end of August, with the only discount from 2025 that beats this rate being a fall to the $140 low back from March. Aside from that, you’re otherwise looking at the next-best price of the year, with $49 cut from the tag here.

items.title: Luigi’s Mansion hits Switch 2 GameCube library soon, grab Luigi’s Mansion 3 at $43 today
items.summary:
Nintendo has now officially announced that Luigi’s Mansion is set to land on the Nintendo Classics GameCube library for Switch 2 just ahead of Halloween this month, just as we hoped for. That means the entire Luigi’s haunted mansion series will soon be playable on Switch 2 and if you haven’t landed a copy of the latest title, you can grab one on sale for $42.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise) over at Woot. Deals on the regularly $60 Luigi’s Mansion 3 don’t come around all too often outside of these Woot sales as of late and now’s your chance to land physical copy to enjoy ahead of Halloween and the release of the original title on Switch Online. 

Nintendo officially announces the next Switch 2 GameCube release

Buy for $6 (Reg. $12.50)

What we love

If you’re tired of dealing with messy cables, this puck-shaped gadget can help. items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Lenovo’s IdeaPad Slim 3x Copilot+ PC with a Snapdragon X processor down to $499.99 shipped. This 2025 model with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD typically goes for $750 at Lenovo where it’s currently at $550. Today’s deal at Amazon, however, beats that and shaves $250 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit earlier this year and more recently during the fall Prime Day sale. We’ve seen the 16GB RAM/256GB variant go for less, but this is the lowest we have seen this 16GB RAM/512GB SSD model fetch. Head below for more details.
